website_summaries.verdict: A mobile dry erase board that includes a ton of accessories needed for the classroom, home school, or office while still being easy on the wallet.
pros: Easy to put together and easy to clean
smooth rubber wheels make for ease of moving from room to room
The many add-ons include push pin magnets, magnetic ruler, magnetic eraser, and gridding tape
Can also be wall-mounted if needed
cons: Markers not included with all of the other extras

customer_reviews.title: Any angle hinges!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several versions of whiteboards for my office as a test, and I've settled on this one. It's better constructed than the others and the ability to angle the whiteboard is something I didn't think I'd care about, but I really like it. It enables me to write on the bottom of the board by tilting it up, and I don't have to hold it while in that position like other "clip and hold" boards with just a flip option. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice white board, arrived quickly as well.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a donation to our church for the pastor to use during bible study, etc. He seems very pleased with it and appreciates that he can use the front and back sides easily by just flipping it over on the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi

customer_reviews.title: Great for homeschooling family
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Super easy to put together and meets our needs, came with magnets which was really nice as well as black tape to create charts etc. we homeschool and use the board daily, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: jbritt826

customer_reviews.title: Great Whiteboard!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this white board for use in a work conference--because the hotel was going to charge $1,000 to rent one. This is a GREAT white board. Big, sturdy--pretty easy to assemble and I can transport it (with some maneuvering) in the back of a minivan. I highly recommend. Great product. I was impressed and am very happy with it (I've had it now for 5 months--and continue to be impressed).
customer_reviews.author: Sudie Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Good office tool
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Holds my calendar on one side with magnets and notes on the other. Was easy to assemble too. Always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Colin J.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Can not complain about this at all. I do love that it is a all in one box. Packed well and everything you need out of the box. I also use this on a wood floor so the rubber wheels are great
customer_reviews.author: James Egbert

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Company
customer_reviews.text: These boards are the perfect size. I had a small issue with one of the legs and the company quickly remedied it with replacement parts. Could not have asked for anything more! Would highly suggest going with their products
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: Whiteboards inspire creativity... many ways to use he
customer_reviews.text: I’m a mother of 4 and have started a formal study hall in my home! We love the white board... it inspires the kids to want to solve math problems, write, draw, act and play (Pictionary is a blast) we use the mobility for use inside different parts of our home and outside in the backyard. Assembly was super easy... we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Mugica

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It is great! Not difficult at all to set up. Has all the bells and whistles. Use it at my work and everyone loves it
customer_reviews.author: Brianna West

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with the quality of the board. All the bolts fit snug. The aluminum legs are smooth and sturdy. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: HWT

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product - Would Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have used this for several months now with no issues. Easy to assemble Construction is very sturdy. Wheels work incredibly well; they are rubber and not the cheap plastic kind. The whiteboard itself is perfect - writes well, magnetic, good height, adjustable and is very easy to clean (and most importantly, it comes completely clean; there are no faint marker lines left after you clean it.) This is much better quality than other whiteboards I have purchased in the past; I would definitely recommend this and would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: CSMITH

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, professional whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs (home office). Would be just as good in my office though. I put off buying a whiteboard because they're expensive and tend to be hit-or-miss quality, but this one is sturdy and professional-quality, with finish caps for fasteners, locking wheels, etc. The whiteboard surface feels like it will last and won't be stained easily. The marker tray could be a bit more rigid or reinforced or attached differently (it's affixed with 3 machine screws, but this is a long, thin and flat piece that might be subject to bending if someone is tempted to lean on the tray), but it looks very good and is obviously high quality. No missing pieces. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus H. Mccandless

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice
customer_reviews.text: We researched several white boards before going with this one. Most of the reviews on the other whiteboards said the board was cheaply made and had plastic wheels that you could not lock...which is not the case with this one. We were looking for something that would last a long time so those reviews made us keep looking and we stumbled across this one. Not only was it comparatively priced to the other ones that people didn't like but it comes with so many extra accessories - grid tape, magnet push pins, dry/erase sponge and even a ruler. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: good product, not great
customer_reviews.text: White board was easy to assemble (relatively) and it looks great. Super easy to erase and clean. Only issue are the wheel assembly. If you aren’t extremely carefully, you are prone to bend the screw holes for the casters, which will make rolling the board around almost impossible. Eventually I had to remove all the wheels since two parts of the frame that they screw into bent. So please make sure no one plays around with the board or stands on the lower bars (you will bend the frame). Other than that it is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Wife needed a white board for the house to help her along with her PhD work. Great product. Relatively easy to assemble with only one or two moments where I had to back up a step and correct a mistake on my part. I assembled it myself but definitely could have benefited from having another pair of hands around. Quality is right on point and sturdy. Castor wheels help move it along even on carpet. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: John Blue

customer_reviews.title: and it seems like it's going to be a great product overall
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and it arrived right on time. My only complaint is that there were one or two small defects in the whiteboard (about the size of a dime). These may have been created during the delivery process, as the package was somewhat beaten up when it arrived, but this isn't clear. Anyhow, this was not enough to make me want to return it, and it seems like it's going to be a great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, sturdy product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Pleasantly surprised at quality. Love that it is magnetic and double sided. Also love that you can adjust angle which helps in writing. The only suggestion is to provide better assemble instructions. The first attempt I missed that the legs have to be installed a specific direction to accommodate angle feature so I had to assemble twice.
customer_reviews.author: Kels

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing/qualities assurance flaws kept this products disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I will start with the cons of this product. Upon assembly, several screws simply do not screw on properly. One hole was drilled too large for the screw to catch; one hole was too small for the screw to be tightened. All of these culminate to a compromise in the final sturdiness and integrity of the product. All very avoidable flaws with the proper manufacturing. The screw caps do not appear to fit over the screws. Very disappointed with the quality of the manufacturing. Would not purchase again. The pros are the white board itself seems to be in good qualities, the casters work well without any issues of moving the board around.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about getting this. I am in school right now and I just thought it would be nice to have this at home to do math and write things out. It’s awesome! I’m so glad I went for it! It’s so useful and can even be used for family meetings and teaching your kids things as I have now used it for since getting it. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SLee

customer_reviews.title: Package didn't include parts
customer_reviews.text: I hope to be able to update this to a 5 star, soon buuuuut....we received the package without instructions, screws, wheels, the knobs, etc. Just the raw pieces which need to be put together. Hoping the company will see this and overnight the missing pieces to us!
customer_reviews.author: Mos_Steph

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Large writing space and easy to flip. 2 of the 4 wheels have a lock to keep in place. That being said, I can simply slide it across my wood floor if desired (with wheel locks on), so I'm not sure if these are useful at my home. The tray is handy. I also like the magnets that come with the board. Also, these are cheap and can be bought in a large quantity for $10. The magnet ruler is a nice touch as well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Doshi

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, some minor quality concerns.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's pretty decent. The ledge to hold markers fell off the first day, but it's fixable with slightly larger screws than it came with. One of the wheels didn't roll well, but I fixed it with some WD-40. Easy to assemble. The magnetic thumbtacks are awesome and the eraser that came with it is great also. Overall pretty good, despite some slight quality issues. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TnTGoblin

customer_reviews.title: Great board, difficult to assemble without instructions!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great board and I really love it now that it is put together. But without clear instructions I had a difficult time and had to redo one part (as another reviewer mentioned) a second time. If there were clear instructions that went with it this would ease the difficulty and would have earned 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Soulkz

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put together
customer_reviews.text: The directions are very poor and there is one screw that wont screw in all the way and it’s huge and not something that’s easy to take apart and then put back together to fit in a car/suv .. now I’m looking for someone w pickup truck to deliver it to the location as is
customer_reviews.author: naomi hickey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I use this board for online teaching and I love how easy it is to flip from one side to the next. It was a simple assembly, and the quality is fantastic for such a reasonable price. Customer service has been very helpful when I experienced a small issue that occurred during the shipment, but they fixed it right away. Highly recommend this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Stafford

customer_reviews.title: As described, but no written assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is a large white board and sturdy once assembled. There a NO WORDS on the assembly paper, just pictures. I understand that having to print instructions in all languages is expensive, but give an option to download them in specific language. It was very frustrating assembling the whiteboard without written instructions. Box was wet and damaged when delivered, but the contents inside were not damaged and packaged extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not senior friendly
customer_reviews.text: I am using this item as my story board to construct my next novel and it is just what I needed. It's a great product and very well made. The only problem I had was trying to put it together. The are no assembly directions and the sheet showing the pieces is somewhat confusing. It is hard for a senior citizen (over seventy) to get down on the floor and wrestle with this thing unless you are very familiar with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a portable whiteboard for personal use. It was quick to assemble and I love all the extra useful pieces that came along with it. This board is wonderful. My large family constantly moves it around during homework hours. It's durable and useful. Big ++++!
customer_reviews.author: mama4

customer_reviews.title: Dented & Confused
customer_reviews.text: It arrived dented and the instructions were fairly confusing for somebody who is not used to putting things together. I took it apart and put it back together three different times. Rather than deal with the headache of returning it I’m just going to feel better by morning other people that the price point on this definitely doesn’t justify the dented confusing board you’ll put together.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Klyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble fast.
customer_reviews.text: Came together quickly and easily. 1 page diagram instructions easy to follow. Accessories semi disappointing quality, but still cool additions. Only issue was one side the pre drilled holes were too small for the cosmetic plugs to go in, but the bolts fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Deitz

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One was damaged and still sent to me. Not impressed with the overall quality of the whiteboards even the undamaged one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Whiteboard for everyday usage!
customer_reviews.text: I love this whiteboard! It is the perfect size and can be tilted for writing at the bottom of the board with ease, plus it can be rolled into another room in a jiffy should you be having company. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Shihtzu

customer_reviews.title: Such A Delightful Teaching Aid.
customer_reviews.text: This whiteboard lives up to its description! We are happily using it in our Bible Class. The board is substantial and roomy enough for all the high points and outlines we need. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: annmarie easley

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: 5 star rating because we do like this white board and its features - it is a solid product. (The box did arrive damaged/taped on one corner and the directions must have fallen out. My daughters did figure out how to assemble even if they did miss adding the washers...easily added.)
customer_reviews.author: Tina H.

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Easy to assemble and sturdy. Easy to use (I use it on a daily basis in my home office). The only minor issue is that it is hard to completely get rid of previous markings (it leaves a slight discoloration even after a thorough clean). But still very usable.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Voirin

customer_reviews.title: Scratches on the surface
customer_reviews.text: This whiteboard is pretty cool. It's huge and sturdy. Only problem I have is the scratches on the surface.
customer_reviews.author: S. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is just fine. The frame is solid and sturdy. The packaging was not the best. The board casing was dented in several places and the board itself was slightly bent or indented in several places. One of the side handing screws that protrude from the board was also bent. Seller was responsive and provided compensation for the damaged whiteboard, including offering a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T

customer_reviews.title: Works For Us
customer_reviews.text: This product is used in a training room for ministerial candidates. It is functional and works well. The only complaint is that it doesn't seem to be real sturdy. It moves a lot when being used but other than that it works for us.
customer_reviews.author: piggysue63

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the quality but the directions...not so
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed with the solid quality and all the features, especially for the price. The directions for assembly left something to be desired – basically there are no directions, just a diagram, and as a result I installed the bottom cross beam where the middle one should be and vice versa. I had to disassemble it and switch them because the middle beam has holes for the accessory tray. But I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Audio Department BGEA

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality, even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Came with bent board. Customer service rep sent an entire new replacement unit! 5 stars for that alone, but the product is fantastic. Exactly what I needed for family organization and mini math lessons/homework help sessions with my kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Tanyalyn Kho

customer_reviews.title: Its just a whiteboard, with a deep ding in it to boot
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with nothing but the whiteboard in the box. No stand, no accessories, no wheels, nada. The whiteboard itself had a big gouge in it as it was packed with 2 pieces of cardboard flanking it rather any Styrofoam or any other protective materials. Would not buy again, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David Veca

customer_reviews.title: Great White Board
customer_reviews.text: I use this for business & it is a great board & is double sided so I can flip it over & use both sides!
customer_reviews.author: MattB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy frame and pretty easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This will be perfect for homeschooling my son. Sad that there's a dent in the board before we even start, but not worth taking it apart, returning it and the re-assembling another one. I was able to assemble it by myself (a woman) rather easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable board!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is great!!! The black tape that came with it is awesome!!!! All of the accessories are really great and it is transportable! Perfect for our needs!!!
customer_reviews.author: owen16

customer_reviews.title: Love this board!
customer_reviews.text: We love this board and use both sides daily. I wish it came with the grid for the calendar already on it but otherwise I’d buy it again. Wheels roll very well.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Flora

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spent the money, but I needed something big enough to actually create work flow on, use with my team virtually and make me feel like I was still in the office. I’m glad I purchased this. I put it together myself in about 20 minutes. It’s easy to move and looks great. Great quality! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca reeder

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice and both times one side of the board wrinkled
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but one side of white board is all wrinkled which makes it more of a one-sided white board. I ordered a replacement and it too was wrinkled on one side. What a waste of our time and money. I’d keep it if the company could send me a board that had two good sides. If I’m going to have a one sided board then I can find one for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: No plastic parts!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size! I also liked how easy it was to put together... my favorite part is that there aren’t any plastic parts... wahoo! Plus the magnets are pretty strong... the only downside is that it’s a little bit cumbersome to flip over. You have to unscrew the knobs on the side, flip it over, and then retighten the knobs to write on it... that would be my only suggestion for improvement :)
customer_reviews.author: dholt

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It came clean and protected. My boxed was damaged but the item itself only had a few scratches on its legs. The board was clean and damage-free. With the kids out of school for so long this is a must have. My kids are on the short side so they can only write on the lower part of the board.
customer_reviews.author: kalaria

customer_reviews.title: perfect home schooling
customer_reviews.text: You must have space for it but great to move in and out of a space
customer_reviews.author: TaShieka Carrington

customer_reviews.title: It's a whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble,easy to write on, easy to roll around. Not much you can really say about a whiteboard... It works.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bastian

customer_reviews.title: Good working whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: I like that the seller sent a new replacement whiteboard because the first one arrived damaged and unusable. However the 2nd one was also damaged slightly but is usable. I like the board. It is mobile and stable, and the board wipes clean with erasure and spray cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Delivered Exactly As Promised
customer_reviews.text: The whiteboard is exactly as advertised. Easy to assemble. I thought the erasable surface may be junk but it's actually not. Very clean, smooth, and honestly I'm super surprised for the price. You won't regret the purchase if you're looking for a whiteboard like this.
customer_reviews.author: Willie H

customer_reviews.title: Good product - few issues
customer_reviews.text: The package was damaged on 2 ends so I was concerned about the contents. The contents were fine. The directions do not give any detail. Just a diagram with numbers for all the parts. I didn't realize that the numbers was the sequence you were supposed to put it together by. The caps that are to cover some of the screws are impossible to get on. The board itself it good and once assembled is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Laughrey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and good price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice white board, my doughter loves it, came on time and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Mynor Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Good product, very good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed in a location where we could not hang a whiteboard.
customer_reviews.author: Angel P.

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was damaged when the product was delivered.  However, the product was intact.
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased for a Sunday School teacher who uses it weekly . He thinks it is GREAT, and it is just the right size to illustrate his talking points.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Office
customer_reviews.text: We were in need of a new whiteboard for two of our offices. I purchased this one a few months ago and I am so glad it was a great purchase. The assembly took about 30 minutes and the whiteboard came together nicely. It is very sturdy and we use all of the extra's that came with. Would recommend this whiteboard for any classroom or office space.
customer_reviews.author: Leana Cutone

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: This board did not disappoint. It’s so durable and yet lightweight. It erases great! Literally it’s like magic when you erase...no marks at all! Rotated easily and smoothly. Worth the price!!! Also, I have to move the board around frequently in a small room, and it moves easily, smoothly and noiselessly. So happy. Will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: This whiteboard has a very manageable size. We are able to not only use it but store it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wargin

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and/or defective manufacturing.
customer_reviews.text: I needed this board for a last minute team meeting. Upon unpacking I noticed one side was damaged and the other looked like the white laminate was not done properly and bubbling up. Due to my immediate need I assembled and am using the item. Would be nice if the manufacturer would send just the white board since the rest of the item is in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Masud Roshan

customer_reviews.title: Well made and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: The most difficult thing is putting it together but once that's done this is not a flimsy whiteboard...it's strong, sturdy and stands up to hard use. This is the 3rd one we've purchased from you and I wouldn't hesitate to buy another one if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No hardware...no way to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it might be great but it did not come with any hardware!! :( i waited 2 weeks for this. There is not any way to contact seller. Looks like my only option is to return and try again. I really needed this for my online teaching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value, very sturdy, high quality, whiteboard. Am thinking to purchase a second. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: PeaceLoveSoul121

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged product
customer_reviews.text: When our mobile dry erase board was delivered, it was large, heavy and sturdy like we expected the the board itself is not flat and had ripples across it. It is a two sided, flipable dry erase board but only one side is useable. This is difficult to take apart and send back for a replacement due to its size and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Rose R.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived deformed.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The board arrived with numerous defects. The screw that mounts the board to the stand is bent and the board itself is noticeably deformed. I expected a much higher quality product given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, just take care to get the support for the shelf in the right location. It is very sturdy and easy to move. Well built product. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great whiteboard! It was easy to assemble and is nice and sturdy. Great for home office!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Great item, we purchased this item for our outpatient program and it’s great we can utilize in different areas around the facility.
customer_reviews.author: Elana M. Paredez

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, great for home schooling, easy to clean. Moves nicely over carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: use it every day
customer_reviews.text: The magnetic aspect is super functional as well. I roll it all over the office.
customer_reviews.author: C.W.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, would definitely recommend. First board came damaged from the shipper. They promptly sent out a new board.
customer_reviews.author: Kacee Blackstock

customer_reviews.title: Great Board so far! We bought a second one.
customer_reviews.text: Board came in great shape. Went together well, but the "directions" were a little sparse. All the tools I needed to put it together were in the box! That was awesome. Overall seems great so far.
customer_reviews.author: H. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive whiteboard easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It was a little confusing to assemble. There was a flaw in our first one but I reached out to the vendor and sent a pic. he replaced it. Happy with the customer service and the product.
customer_reviews.author: VL

customer_reviews.title: Great Prodouct, Mediocre Instructions
customer_reviews.text: It's a great size, moves easily, and it seems really sturdy. The only issue was assembly. The instructions are really just a picture of the product with a list of what should be in the box printed on one side. A little bit of explanation would be good.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money
customer_reviews.text: We could have spent considerably more on a similar product, but this one turned out to not only meet but exceed expectations. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was damaged! Poor instruction
customer_reviews.text: First, only one piece of paper of the instruction, didn't tell you which step should go first. So we step up the standing frame first, then found out the board should go with the frame first. The worst was when we open the package of the board, it was damaged! Bad experience. We have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: sijialuo

customer_reviews.title: Good whiteboard,  directions are minimal.
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with the white board. My only complaint is that it only comes with a diagram, no real written instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nice White Board
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy and well built board. We use it a lot. Rolls well, flips well, Etc...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product works great. My daughter uses it for doing her math ...
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. My daughter uses it for doing her math homework. The assembly instructions could be improved by providing more details on the sequence of steps.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gittoes

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the 3 boards and it came in quickly considering it was mailed to Hawaii. They came in undamaged with all the pieces. Assembling the boards were difficult. The instructions kinda sucked.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: one side wrinkled white board
customer_reviews.text: Flybold whiteboard ordered recently on Amazon and arrived late. One side of the whiteboard was wrinkled, but the other side was fine. We needed the whiteboard for a classroom setting that week, so decided to keep it. However, I can’t recommend this whiteboard.
customer_reviews.author: oc_rocker2002

customer_reviews.title: Nice Whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: Nice board but did come with a dent on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Handy Dandy Whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: This whiteboard is great quality, was easy to put together, and is used by our family daily.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy T

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied with product & shipping
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dented, can only use one side. Gray plastic finishing caps too small, did not fit. Did not come with accessories.
customer_reviews.author: R Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great use of board for busy family!
customer_reviews.text: We like it and use it often I really appreciate all accessories that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and was easy to assemble. Or so my son says as I ordered it for him. He loves it. Slides up against the wall and outta the way. He loved all the accessories...esp the grid lines
customer_reviews.author: reena

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This product came immediately with Prime shipping. It was easy to assemble and will fit the bill for everything we needed it for. The price was much less than many others like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great product and overall experience
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and arrived in perfect condition. I read reviews ahead of time and saw that some indicated in could take 2 hrs to assemble but that was not our experience. Simple directions, 15 minute assembly. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up took 3 min to put together, quality work and design. I homeschool 2 children and this made things so much easier than dealing with a walmounted one. It’s worth the price if you use a white board more than just a note board
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The board is super--it is quite large and the angle adjusts and stays adjusted. Wipes clean easily, no ghosts.
customer_reviews.author: CaBr

customer_reviews.title: Good product / Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We got two boards and they are quite sturdy and mobile. Love that we can flip and write on the other side. They do seem to have some issues with packaging/shipping - so do inspect for defects.
customer_reviews.author: Pennadam

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I need for a really good price. My first piece arrived damaged and was ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I need for a really good price. My first piece arrived damaged and was replaced, without any hassle, right away.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula A. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great service, great product.
customer_reviews.text: The whiteboard is not bad for what I paid. Also, their service is great. One of my boards came damaged and they were very amicable in replacing it. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Roane

customer_reviews.title: Solid Unit
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the our last rolling white board, this one has solid rubber casters with ball bearings.It moves very easy over carpet. The bolt system used to assemble it makes this unit much sturdier. Thx
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great, but tray arrived bent
customer_reviews.text: I really like this board, but the packaging was poor and instructions were not great either. The tray was bent upon opening the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Stab

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the job
customer_reviews.text: I am using this white board for job planning on new house builds
customer_reviews.author: jennie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered promptly, item was as described. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service, Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Customer service worked to resolve a shipping issue. Overall I'm very please. Product is well built and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the construction of this whiteboard. The metal frame is quite sturdy, and the mobility is smooth. The whiteboard turns with ease. Very happy with it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: HR VSK

product_meta.title: flybold Mobile Whiteboard 48" x 36" inch Magnetic Double Sided Flip Over Dry Erase Reversible Portable Home Office Classroom Board with Magnetic Eraser Ruler 12 Push Pin Magnets 2 Gridding Tapes
feature_bullets: BETTER THAN THE BEST: Large 48 x 36 inch double sided rolling white board with ADJUSTABLE WRITING ANGLE and WALL MOUNT OPTION. MORE ACCESSORIES than anyone else. STAIN RESISTANT surface that doesn’t leave ghost marks. Smooth RUBBER WHEELS in metal frame to wheel around easily (not plastic). SCRATCH PROOF powder coated stand to keep your board looking good as new. Top quality ASSEMBLY HARDWARE that doesnt give way with use. PROTECTIVE PACKAGING to deliver your board safe, without dent or damage

MORE ACCESSORIES THAN ANYONE ELSE (Worth $50): MAGNETIC ERASER (1) that cleans the board with no ghost marks. MAGNETIC RULER (1) to draw straight lines, straight! GRIDDING TAPES (2) to make a matrix on the board. PUSH PIN MAGNETS (12) to hold up to do’s, notes, reminders. DETACHABLE TRAY (1) to hold markers and accessories

ADJUSTABLE WRITING ANGLE AND WALL MOUNT OPTION: Most boards lock at the bottom center and don’t allow you to adjust writing angle. Our board has side clamp wheels, so you may adjust the writing angle to a position of comfort. Write more, write longer, write in comfort! WALL MOUNT: Our board comes with 4 pre-fabricated holes, so you may take the frame off the stand and mount on the wall – horizontally or vertically.

PERFECT FOR HOME, OFFICE, College, HOME-OFFICE, SCHOOLS, CLASSROOMS, just about anywhere. Set up in a matter of minutes, using a simple instruction booklet and included assembly hardware. The LIGHT ALUMINUM FRAME and the SMOOTH RUBBER caster WHEELS let you move the board within or across rooms with ease.

PROTECTIVE PACKING, NO DENTED BOARDS! Our board is packed in multiple layers of protective packing, and tested intensively for safe transit. No dents, scratches or damage. In the unlikely event that that you are not satisfied, do be assured of a refund or replacement.
